casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Alvin Terrill FOSTER, Jr. No. 104PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2004. George E. Kelly, III, Raleigh, for Foster. G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of June 2004 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 23rd day of June 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of June 2004."
